column4: hey, anyone have some weird mouse problems with Ubuntu?  like single-clicks being interpreted as double-clicks?
remove "Generic Mouse" and all references to it from /etc/X11/XF86Config
you'll have to restart X of course after changing the config file
what should I replace "Generic Mouse" with?
configured mouse should be there already
and should be the "correct" entry for it to use
you should be able to logout of X after making the change
and then do a ctrl-backspace to kill the server and restart it
yes, and you'll have to remove the reference to it at the bottom of the file in the serverlayout section as well
